welcome.greeting:
🤖 Hello {name}!

Welcome to NFT Market Insights Bot! I'm here to help you track NFT collections, set price alerts, and stay updated with the latest market trends.

Use /help to see available commands.

help.title: 📋 **Available Commands:**

commands.rankings: /rankings - View top NFT collections by volume

help.usage:
🔧 **How to use:**
Simply type any of the commands above to interact with the bot.

If you encounter any issues, please try again or contact support.

price.usage: Please provide a collection name. Usage: /price <collection_name>
price.not_found: ❌ Collection '{collection}' not found. Please check the spelling and try again.
price.error: ⚠️ Error fetching price data. Please try again later.

rankings.title: 🏆 **Top NFT Collections**
rankings.error: ⚠️ Error fetching rankings data. Please try again later.
rankings.no_data: ❌ No rankings data available at the moment.

alerts.help:
🔔 **NFT Price Alerts**

**Commands:**
`/alerts list` - View your active alerts
`/alerts add <collection> <price>` - Add price alert
`/alerts remove <id>` - Remove alert by ID

**Examples:**
`/alerts add cryptopunks 50` - Alert when CryptoPunks floor hits 50 ETH
`/alerts add bored-ape-yacht-club 30` - Alert for BAYC at 30 ETH

💡 *Alerts check prices every hour*
alerts.list_empty:
📋 **Your Active Alerts**

🔄 No active alerts found.

Use `/alerts add <collection> <price>` to create your first alert!
alerts.add_usage:
❌ Please provide collection name and target price.

Usage: `/alerts add <collection> <price>`
Example: `/alerts add cryptopunks 50`
alerts.invalid_price:
❌ Invalid price format. Please enter a valid number.

Example: `/alerts add cryptopunks 50`
alerts.add_success:
✅ **Alert Created!**

📊 Collection: {collection}
💰 Target Price: {price} ETH

🔔 You'll be notified when the floor price reaches your target.

*Note: This is a demo implementation. Full alert functionality coming soon!*
alerts.remove_usage:
❌ Please provide alert ID to remove.

Usage: `/alerts remove <id>`
Use `/alerts list` to see your alert IDs.
alerts.remove_success:
✅ **Alert Removed**

🗑️ Alert ID {alert_id} has been removed.

*Note: This is a demo implementation. Full alert functionality coming soon!*
alerts.unknown_command:
❌ Unknown alerts command.

Use `/alerts` to see available options.
alerts.error: ❌ Sorry, something went wrong with alerts. Please try again later.
alerts.title: 🔔 **Price Alert Management**
alerts.no_alerts:
You have no active price alerts.

To set an alert, use: /alert <collection> <price>
alerts.max_alerts: ❌ You have reached the maximum limit of 10 alerts. Please remove an existing alert before adding a new one.
alerts.set_error: ❌ Error setting alert. Please try again.

errors.general: ⚠️ An unexpected error occurred. Please try again later.
errors.api_error: ⚠️ Service temporarily unavailable. Please try again later.
errors.invalid_command: ❌ Invalid command. Use /help to see available commands.
